---
title: "Tutorials"
---

Here you can find tutorials for setting up your coding environment and for using the OpenAI API locally. These tutorials are not required for the workshop, and are intended for those who want to use the OpenAI API locally.


| Tutorial | Purpose |
|-------|--------|
| [Setup coding environment](setup-vscode/index.qmd) | Guide to installing Python, Visual Studio Code, and the necessary extensions.
| [Setup OpenAI on your local machine](setup-openai/index.qmd) | Guide to setting up the OpenAI and other necessary Python packages on your local machine.
